caption: Comparison of pharmacokinetic parameters between participants receiving levetiracetam via naso- or orogastric tube vs. participants receiving the drug orally
footnote: All values expressed as medians and interquartile ranges. Maximum plasma concentration (Cmax), time to maximum plasma concentration (Tmax) and area under the curve 0–12 h (AUC0–12). The study was not powered to specifically compare naso- or orogastric administration vs. oral administration.
